snippet: Almost half of the Italian bank's income in the first quarter, or 477 million euros, came from UniCredit buying back roughly 3 billion euros of its own debt, at up to 50 percent of the bonds' face value.
abstract: Almost half of the Italian bank's income in the first quarter, or 477 million euros, came from UniCredit buying back roughly 3 billion euros of its own debt, at up to 50 percent of the bonds' face value.

headline.main: UniCredit Profit Rises on Debt Buyback
